name: end_rental
attributes: # [doc = " Escrow から NFT を返却するが、"]
# [doc = " has_one = owner, has_one = escrow_account はあるものの"]
# [doc = " actual renter（借り手）との照合が抜けているため、"]
# [doc = " 攻撃者が他人の契約を指定して返却処理を実行できる"]
body: let contract = & mut ctx . accounts . rental_contract ;

let cpi_accounts = Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . escrow_account . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . user_token_account . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . service_authority . to_account_info () , } ;
let cpi_ctx = CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , cpi_accounts) ;

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 出品者（所有者チェックのみ）"]

fields.name: escrow_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " Escrow 用 NFT アカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user_token_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " NFT を受け取るべき借り手のアカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: service_authority
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CPI 用のサービス権限"]

fields.name: renter
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 借り手の Pubkey（照合漏れ）"]

fields.name: escrow_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " Escrow 用トークンアカウント Pubkey"]
